Parameters.Parameter: A faithful reimplementation of the standard OpenStreetMap style

Datasource.Parameter: (SELECT way, "natural", waterway, landuse, name, way_area/NULLIF(!pixel_width!::real*!pixel_height!::real,0) AS way_pixels FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE (waterway IN ('dock', 'riverbank', 'canal') OR landuse IN ('reservoir', 'basin') OR "natural" IN ('water', 'glacier')) AND building IS NULL AND way_area > 0.01*!pixel_width!::real*!pixel_height!::real ORDER BY z_order, way_area DESC ) AS water_areas

(SELECT way, waterway, intermittent, CASE WHEN tunnel IN ('yes', 'culvert') THEN 'yes' ELSE 'no' END AS int_tunnel FROM planet_osm_line WHERE waterway IN ('stream', 'drain', 'ditch') ) AS water_lines_casing
(SELECT way, waterway, intermittent FROM planet_osm_line WHERE waterway = 'river' ) AS water_lines_low_zoom

(SELECT way, waterway, name, intermittent, CASE WHEN tunnel IN ('yes', 'culvert') THEN 'yes' ELSE 'no' END AS int_tunnel, 'no' AS bridge FROM planet_osm_line WHERE waterway IN ('river', 'canal', 'derelict_canal', 'stream', 'drain', 'ditch', 'wadi') AND (bridge IS NULL OR bridge NOT IN ('yes', 'aqueduct')) ORDER BY z_order ) AS water_lines
(SELECT way FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE leisure = 'marina' ) AS marinas_area
